issue.title: [C++][Compute] Use a node counter as the label if no label is supplied
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14235](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14235). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ExecNodes may be given a label.  If no label is supplied we can generate a numeric ID instead (e.g. Node 0, Node 1, ...)
